item.title: Bangalore to Trivandrum Solo Travel Plan
item.description: Traveling solo from Bangalore to Trivandrum offers a wonderful opportunity to explore the cultural richness, natural beauty, and vibrant atmosphere of Kerala's capital city. Here's a solo travel plan for your trip: Day 1: Arrival in Trivandrum Arrive in Trivandrum by flight, train, or bus. Check into your accommodation and freshen up. Explore local attractions like Padmanabhaswamy Tem
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Varkala Solo Trip Plan
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Varkala can be a rejuvenating experience, as you'll get to explore the stunning beaches, cliffs, and spiritual charm of this coastal town in Kerala. Here's a suggested itinerary for your journey: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Coimbatore -> Trivandrum -> Varkala -> Madurai -> Salem -> Bangalore Bangalore -> Mysore -
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
